data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7, Android 8.0 with August security patches (R16NW.G930FXXU2ERH4)
data.actual_result: Discord opens and shows you the last chat you were in with a toast notification saying "You are unauthorized to perform this request."
data.expected_result: Discord should open and show the correct conversation
data.short_description: Opening Discord from a notification for a DM from an account you've never DMed before fails with a toast notification saying "You are unauthorized to perform this request."
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a throwaway account (that's the easiest way to get an account you've never talked to before) - Close Discord on your "main" account to make sure you'll get the notification (completely close it from the app switcher) - Send a message from your throwaway account to your main - Open it from the notification
